# {{lb|fr|gardenry|uncountable}} a strongly acidic soil where organic matter decomposes slowly, characteristic of plants such as [[heather]]
types.html:
terre de bruyère f (uncountable)

  1. (gardenry, uncountable) a strongly acidic soil where organic matter decomposes slowly, characteristic of plants such as heather
trans: a strongly acidic soil where organic matter decomposes slowly, characteristic of plants such as heather

title: terre de bruyère
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /tɛʁ də bʁy.jɛʁ/
